::Spears::

She made it to the mass hall and got a glass of liquid energon and 
sat down.  She sipped at her drink.  She wondered if she would see 
battle or get stuck here.  Part of her didn't want to fight.  She 
kind of remembered the maximals.  But only very little, more like an 
old impression of them.  But the other part wanted to fight.  To show 
that she was a good fighter, and to make Prebon proud of her. she 
sipped her glass and then looked at the liquid in the glass.  





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Trainers
> 
> "Ramulus? Ramulus is the Maximal commander. We are going to kill 
him, 
> and than take the rest by surprise at their base. Oh, and 
> Slayer....lay of Spears. She is loyal and is a good warrior. She 
may 
> not be at your level but she's still good. If you keep this up you 
> will have to answer to me. Understand? Good. Now come, the battle 
> awaits."
> 
> Prebon lef the area to gather the reest of their army.
